ConsoleObject Class Reference

#include <consoleobject.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

The Console to Object wrapper.

To provides the console access to Instance of classes, we use a ConsoleObject for each class. All the ConsoleObject must be a subclass of this.

irr::core::stringw name
 The name of the object.

Member Data Documentation

irr::core::stringw ConsoleObject::name [private]
 

The name of the object.

This name can't be null. It's the name we use in the console to access its attributes.
